Read so many reviews of so many people loving this game, but if you're a fan of old adventure games this one doesn't stack up. First, you can only tap on things, no look, no use, no open, no pull, no talk, only tap on things. And there are many things in the environment that you cant tap on, so I'm constantly holding down on the screen just to see what I can tap on. I like to look at something before I pick it up, so I know what I'm picking up, nope not here, you tapped on it now whatever it is, is in your inventory. Also the pace at which the character walks is too slow, I think just to make the game longer. The voices cut out sometimes so I have to keep the subtitles on just to know what is being said and the voice acting is ok at best. Honestly I've played free adventure games much better than this, if you're going to pay for an adventure game play Thimbleweed Park, it's more $$ but well worth it.
